channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 17:24 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 17:24 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganets Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
